homeautomation.apps

Class RasPiServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Timer
      • homeautomation.apps.RasPiServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IHomeautomationApp

    public class RasPiServer
extends java.util.Timer
implements IHomeautomationApp
    Temperature and Humidity Measurement in the cellar.
